FROM PROD A LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_SECTOR B ON(A.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO)
WHERE PROD_STOCK < PROD_SAFE_STOCK
AND PROD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{detailSearch.prod_name}||'%'
AND PROD_NO LIKE '%'||#{detailSearch.prod_no}||'%'
AND LPROD_NO LIKE '%'||#{detailSearch.lprod_no}||'%'
AND PROD_USE LIKE '%'||#{detailSearch.prod_use}||'%'
AND PROD_VALIDITY >= #{detailSearch.startDay} AND PROD_VALIDITY < #{detailSearch.endDay}
AND PROD_OUT_PRICE >= #{detailSearch.startPrice} AND PROD_OUT_PRICE < #{detailSearch.endPrice}
mapper.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , a.prod_no, lprod_no, prod_name, prod_use , prod_stock_size, to_char(prod_validity,'YYYY-MM-DD') prod_validity, prod_out_price , prod_stock , prod_safe_stock , prod_stand_size, prod_standard
) Z WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} ORDER BY RNUM
mapper.sql:
FROM PDUCT_OR A LEFT OUTER JOIN PDUCT_LIST B ON(A.PORDER_NO = B.PORDER_NO) INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON(A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO)
PORDER_CONFIRM LIKE 'Y'
PORDER_CONFIRM LIKE 'N'
C.EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{detailSearch.emp_name}||'%'
AND A.PORDER_DATE >= #{detailSearch.startDay} AND A.PORDER_DATE < #{detailSearch.endDay}
AND A.PORDER_CONFIRM LIKE '%'||#{detailSearch.porder_confirm}||'%'
mapper.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM ( select ROWNUM RNUM, c.emp_name , a.porder_no, a.emp_no, to_char(porder_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') porder_date, A.porder_confirm , B.prod_no, B.pduct_no, B.pduct_cnt
) Z WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} ORDER BY RNUM

SELECT rownum rnum , A.PORDER_NO, A.EMP_NO, to_char(porder_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') PORDER_DATE, A.PORDER_CONFIRM , B.PROD_NO, B.PDUCT_NO, B.PDUCT_CNT , C.EMP_NAME , D.PROD_NO, D.PROD_NAME , E.MAT_NUMBER , E.MAT_SIZE, E.MAT_NO , F.MAT_NAME , G.DEP_NAME FROM PDUCT_OR A LEFT OUTER JOIN PDUCT_LIST B ON(A.PORDER_NO = B.PORDER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON(A.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD D ON(B.PROD_NO = D.PROD_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN BOM E ON(D.PROD_NO = E.PROD_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MATERIAL F ON(E.MAT_NO = F.MAT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENT g ON(c.dep_no=g.dep_no) WHERE A.PORDER_NO = #{porder_no,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE MATERIAL M SET MAT_STOCK = ( SELECT (D.MAT_STOCK - (B.PDUCT_CNT * C.MAT_NUMBER)) FROM PDUCT_OR A LEFT OUTER JOIN PDUCT_LIST B ON(A.PORDER_NO = B.PORDER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN BOM C ON(C.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO) INNER JOIN MATERIAL D ON(C.MAT_NO = D.MAT_NO) WHERE A.PORDER_NO = #{porder_no} AND D.MAT_NO LIKE #{mat_no} ) WHERE MAT_NO LIKE #{mat_no}

UPDATE MAT_SECTOR SET MAT_CNT = ( SELECT (E.MAT_CNT - (B.PDUCT_CNT * C.MAT_NUMBER)) FROM PDUCT_OR A LEFT OUTER JOIN PDUCT_LIST B ON(A.PORDER_NO = B.PORDER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN BOM C ON(C.PROD_NO = B.PROD_NO) INNER JOIN MATERIAL D ON(C.MAT_NO = D.MAT_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MAT_SECTOR E ON(D.MAT_NO = E.MAT_NO) WHERE A.PORDER_NO = #{porder_no} AND D.MAT_NO LIKE #{mat_no} AND E.SECTOR_NO LIKE #{sector_no} ) WHERE MAT_NO = #{mat_no} and sector_no = #{sector_no}
mapper.sql:
FROM ( SELECT 'OR001' AS CODE, a.deliv_no as board_no, a.emp_no as emp_no , to_char(a.deliv_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as write_date , to_char(a.deliv_schd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as out_date , a.DELIV_PROG as deliv_prog , b.emp_name as emp_name , c.dep_name as dep_name, c.dep_no as dep_no, c.dep_no2 as dep_no2 , d.or_no as or_no , prod_out_no , j.prod_sector as out_prod_sector , j.emp_no as out_emp_no FROM or_delivery a left outer join orderp d on(a.or_no = d.or_no) left outer join employee b on(a.emp_no = b.emp_no) left outer join department c on(b.dep_no = c.dep_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_OUT J ON(A.DELIV_NO = J.DELIV_NO) )
DELIV_PROG LIKE 'OR02'
DELIV_PROG LIKE 'OR01'
DELIV_PROG LIKE 'OR99'
EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{detailSearch.emp_name}||'%'
AND WRITE_DATE >= #{detailSearch.startDay} AND WRITE_DATE <= #{detailSearch.endDay}
mapper.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, code, board_no, emp_no, write_date, out_date , deliv_prog, emp_name, dep_name, dep_no, dep_no2, or_no , prod_out_no, out_prod_sector, out_emp_no
) Z WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} ORDER BY RNUM

SELECT 'OR001' AS CODE, a.deliv_no as board_no, a.emp_no as emp_no , to_char(a.deliv_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as write_date , to_char(a.deliv_schd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as out_date , a.DELIV_PROG as deliv_prog , b.emp_name as emp_name , c.dep_name as dep_name, c.dep_no as dep_no, c.dep_no2 as dep_no2 , d.or_no as or_no , e.prod_no as prod_no, e.orp_qty as orp_qty , f.prod_name as prod_name , f.prod_stock as prod_stock , f.prod_stock_size as prod_stock_size , prod_out_no , j.prod_sector as out_prod_sector , j.emp_no as out_emp_no , m.store_no FROM or_delivery a left outer join orderp d on(a.or_no = d.or_no) left outer join or_plist e on (d.or_no = e.or_no) left outer join prod f on (e.prod_no = f.prod_no) left outer join employee b on(a.emp_no = b.emp_no) left outer join department c on(b.dep_no = c.dep_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD_OUT J ON(A.DELIV_NO = J.DELIV_NO) left outer join prod_sector k on(J.PROD_SECTOR = k.prod_sector) left outer join sector l on(k.sector_no = l.sector_no ) left outer join store m on(l.store_no = m.store_no) WHERE A.DELIV_NO = #{board_no}
mapper.sql:
From( SELECT a.ret_no as ret_no, status, a.ret_date as ret_date , a.pur_code as pur_code, a.emp_no as emp_no , b.retmat_no as retmat_no, b.retmat_qty as retmat_qty, b.ormat_code as ormat_code , c.mat_no as mat_no , c.or_code as or_code, c.ormat_qty as ormat_qty, cost , d.mat_name as mat_name, d.mat_stock as mat_stock , e.SECTOR_NO as sector_no, e.MAT_CNT as mat_cnt, e.mat_sector_no as mat_sector_no , g.STORE_NO as store_no, h.emp_name as emp_name , i.MET_OUT_NO as met_out_no FROM buy_return a inner join buy_ret_m b on(a.ret_no = b.ret_no) inner join buy_or_mat c on(b.ormat_code = c.ormat_code) inner join material d on(c.mat_no = d.mat_no) left outer join mat_sector e on(d.mat_no=e.mat_no) left outer join sector f on(e.sector_no = f.sector_no) left outer join store g on(f.store_no=g.store_no) left outer join employee h on(a.emp_no = h.emp_no) left outer join MATERIAL_OUT i on(b.retmat_no = i.retmat_no) )
STATUS LIKE 'Q001'
STATUS LIKE 'Q002'
STATUS LIKE 'Q006'
EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{detailSearch.emp_name}||'%'
AND RET_DATE >= #{detailSearch.startDay} AND RET_DATE <= #{detailSearch.endDay}
mapper.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, ret_no, status, to_char(ret_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') ret_date, pur_code, emp_name
) Z WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow} ORDER BY RNUM

SELECT a.ret_no as ret_no, status, to_char(a.ret_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as ret_date , a.pur_code as pur_code, a.emp_no as emp_no , b.retmat_no as retmat_no, b.retmat_qty as retmat_qty, b.ormat_code as ormat_code , c.mat_no as mat_no , c.or_code as or_code, c.ormat_qty as ormat_qty, cost , d.mat_name as mat_name, d.mat_stock as mat_stock , e.SECTOR_NO as sector_no, e.MAT_CNT as mat_cnt, e.mat_sector_no as mat_sector_no , g.STORE_NO as store_no, h.emp_name as emp_name , i.MET_OUT_NO as met_out_no FROM buy_return a inner join buy_ret_m b on(a.ret_no = b.ret_no) inner join buy_or_mat c on(b.ormat_code = c.ormat_code) inner join material d on(c.mat_no = d.mat_no) left outer join mat_sector e on(d.mat_no=e.mat_no) left outer join sector f on(e.sector_no = f.sector_no) left outer join store g on(f.store_no=g.store_no) left outer join employee h on(a.emp_no = h.emp_no) left outer join MATERIAL_OUT i on(b.retmat_no = i.retmat_no) WHERE A.RET_NO = #{ret_no}
